dict.acceptation: 通过，穿过；经由；透过；凭借；
从头到尾；彻底；自始至终；
（电话）接通；通话完毕；有洞的；直达的；

sent.orig: He attempted to create capitalism through feudalism, Christianity through Confucianism, democracy through despotism, nationalism through chauvinism.
sent.trans: 他企图通过封建主义实行资本主义，通过儒家学说实行基督教义，通过专制独裁实行民主，通过沙文主义实行民族主义。

sent.orig: They will not win through backroom deals, intrigue, supporting the distasteful, or through low-price lower-quality products.
sent.trans: 他们将不是通过秘密协定、诡计花招、支持无赖国家或生产廉价劣质产品取胜。

sent.orig: Syphilis can be transmitted through vaginal, oral or anal sexual contact, and even through kissing.
sent.trans: 梅毒能够通过阴道性交、口交和肛交所传染，甚至能通过接吻传染。

sent.orig: And He is as willing to manifest His power through us as through the first disciples.
sent.trans: 而且他也愿意藉著我们显示他的能力，正如当日藉著第一批门徒所显示的一样。

sent.orig: Rom.7:11 For sin, seizing the opportunity through the commandment, deceived me and through it killed me.
sent.trans: 罗七11因为罪藉著诫命得著机会，诱骗了我，并且藉著诫命杀了我。
